articles.description: The Food and Drug Administration (FDA) on Wednesday released its analysis of Johnson & Johnson’s one-shot dose COVID-19 vaccine, supporting its authorization for emergency use. The vaccine would be the third to become available in the United States, after the…
articles.content:

articles.title: Fry's Electronics shutters stores, deletes social media accounts in sudden closure nationwide - KHOU.com
articles.description: After years of rumors and photos of empty shelves, it is official.
articles.content:
HOUSTON Fry's Electronics has closed all of its locations across the country, including the multiple stores in the Houston area.
